short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets a custom new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your New Tab Experience!
Say goodbye to bland, lifeless new tabs. Our extension turns every new tab into a sleek, modern command center tailored just for you.

Key Features:

-Stylish, customizable interface
-Quick-access shortcuts to your favorite sites
-Live world news feed keeps you informed
-Personalized backgrounds - choose a color or upload your own image
-Clean, distraction-free search bar
-Elegant time and date display

Boost your productivity and enjoy a fresh browsing experience with every new tab. Make your browser work for you - download now and step into the future of web navigation!
